products.name: AromaBrew Pro 800
products.short_description: Premium bean-to-cup machine for larger offices needing café-quality coffee.
products.long_description: AromaBrew Pro 800 is Coffee Party’s top-tier machine featuring a ceramic grinder, dual-thermoblock heating, and customizable drink profiles. Designed for high-volume use in medium to large workplaces.

products.name: OfficeFlow Mini
products.short_description: Compact, reliable, and fast — perfect for small teams.
products.long_description: OfficeFlow Mini combines simplicity with high-quality brewing. Supports whole beans and ground coffee, and comes with a built-in milk frother. Ideal for meeting rooms or small office setups.

products.name: BrewStation XL
products.short_description: High-capacity filter coffee system for large workplaces and events.
products.long_description: BrewStation XL is built for continuous brewing, making it perfect for hotels, coworking spaces, or company cafeterias. Equipped with a large water tank, advanced filter system, and auto-cleaning cycle.

products.name: BaristaTouch One
products.short_description: A smart touchscreen espresso machine with customizable recipes.
products.long_description: BaristaTouch One brings café convenience to the office. Users can save personalized coffee profiles, adjust grind size, temperature, milk froth levels, and more — all from a responsive touchscreen.

products.name: Nordic Roast - Medium
products.short_description: Balanced and smooth with notes of caramel and red berries.
products.long_description: Roasted in Sweden, this blend combines beans from South America and East Africa. Works well for both espresso and filter brewing.

products.name: Midnight Espresso
products.short_description: Dark, intense espresso with chocolate undertones.
products.long_description: Midnight Espresso delivers a bold, full-bodied flavor ideal for milk-based drinks like cappuccinos and lattes.

products.name: Fika Blend - Light Roast
products.short_description: A bright and floral Scandinavian-style light roast.
products.long_description: Fika Blend brings a crisp acidity and jasmine aroma, making it perfect for pour-over or automatic filter machines.

products.name: Mountain Peak Organic
products.short_description: Organic medium-dark roast with nutty, earthy tones.
products.long_description: Certified organic and sourced from small farms in Central America, this roast offers a rich, smooth finish.

products.name: French Roast Bold
products.short_description: Smoky dark roast for those who love strong, robust flavor.
products.long_description: Deeply roasted to produce a smoky aroma and pronounced bitterness. Great for strong black coffee.

products.name: Decaf Harmony
products.long_description: Swiss-Water decaffeinated beans that maintain a natural sweetness and smooth body.

products.name: Ethiopian Sunrise
products.short_description: Fruity and aromatic with blueberry and floral notes.
products.long_description: A single-origin Ethiopian light roast known for its vibrant acidity and naturally sweet aftertaste.

products.name: Brazilian Classic
products.short_description: Smooth, chocolatey, and reliable — a perfect everyday coffee.
products.long_description: This medium roast offers a rounded flavor with mild acidity. A great choice for large workplaces.

products.name: Office Coffee Party Experience
products.short_description: A premium coffee-tasting event tailored for companies.
products.long_description: Coffee Party brings a full tasting setup to your office. Includes guided coffee sessions, equipment demos, team-building activities, and exclusive corporate product discounts.

products.name: Coffee Party Pop-Up
products.short_description: A public tasting event where visitors can sample new beans and buy Coffee Party products.
products.long_description: Hosted monthly across Swedish cities, the Consumer Coffee Party Pop-Up offers coffee tasting, brewing workshops, and exclusive retail offers for visitors.
